thread.title: California almond growers brace for impact of China tariffs

title: California almond growers brace for impact of China tariffs
text:
California almond growers brace for impact of China tariffs 3:52am EDT - 01:35
As the U.S. and China prepare for trade talks in Washington today, farmers in California's Central Valley are bracing for the impact of China's increased tariffs on agricultural produce. Ciara Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
As the U.S. and China prepare for trade talks in Washington today, farmers in California's Central Valley are bracing for the impact of China's increased tariffs on agricultural produce.
